title: Home Screen & Notification Bar font color
content: I recently bought a Pixel 4a 5g.  After transferring the files, etc from my Pixel 2, I noticed that the home screen fonts are white, as is the notication bar.  This is annoying, cause I have a "snow" background & the fonts are not very legible.  My Pixel 2, with the same background, has black fonts & notification bar.  How do I get black for my new Pixel ?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
